derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'ancient history'): from modern Latin archaeologia, from Greek arkhaiologia 'ancient history', from arkhaios 'ancient' (see archaeo-). The current sense dates from the mid 19th cent

entry.def: Archaeology is the study of the societies and peoples of the past by examining the remains of their buildings, tools, and other objects.

means.word_mean: 1. the branch of anthropology that studies prehistoric people and their cultures
